page.title: 06Visiting Himbleton
page.content: As we are situated close to the centre of the Midlands and within easy reach of many places of interest we do have a significant number of visitors to the area. Visitor are catered for in three ways: 1) Bed & Breakfast accomodation is run by various farms and should you find one full our friendly farmer will gladly direct you to his nearest neibough with accomodation. 2) Holiday Cottages are hired out by local land owners who have accomodation surplus to their employees' requirments. 3) Caravan Sites for visitors bringing their own caravan. This is very popular with Caravan Clubs. It is a pleasant rural base from which to explore Worcestershire and its surroundings.
